title: Nightlong - Union City Conspiracy [ENG] [ISO]
description:
Published by: Microprose
Developed by: Team17 Software
Genre: Adventure
Number of Players: 1
Release Date:
Europe: September 28, 1998
US: October 20, 1999


When your long-time friend, Hugh Martens, summons you to help him with a matter of major political importance, you know you\&#039;re going in for a tough adventure. It\&#039;s 2099, and you\&#039;re top-notch investigator named Reev. It seems that a group of terrorists is tearing the city to shreds, and Martens has called on you to put an end to the madness. Make your way through this 3D mystery, collecting clues and items for later use. A puzzle-solving journey of the highest caliber, NIGHTLONG is a genuine epic.
